openfoodfacts.github.scrachx.openfood.network

Interface OpenFoodAPIService


  • public interface OpenFoodAPIService
    Define our Open Food Facts API endpoints. All REST methods such as GET, POST, PUT, UPDATE, DELETE can be stated in here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PRODUCT_API_COMMENT
